prompt: A foreman accuses a dockhand of theft before a restless crowd. A quick sentence would calm men, but maybe condemn the innocent.

options.text: Demand sworn testimony and measured judgment.
options.response: You insist on witnesses under oath. Order holds, if barely.

options.text: Offer restitution to avoid blood and delay.
options.response: You pay restitution from priory reserves to buy peace and time.

options.text: Protect the accused and escort him to clergy custody.
options.response: The crowd curses, but no lynching follows under your escort.
